page.title: 20SUNDAY BY CLAUDETTE
page.content: I woke up, got out of bed and opened my gerbil cage and looked at the babies which had been born yesterday. I went down stairs. I was the last person out of bed. After breakfast, I cleaned my teeth and brushed my hair. I said to my mum "What shall I wear?" She replied, "We might be going swimming so put on your bathing trunks. We decided we would go swimming. We packed a picnic and drove to Wittering beach. When we got there we sat on the beach and unpacked our things. I have only just learned to swim in the swimming pools,so I was finding it hard to swim in the sea. I made it in the end. I came out and sunbathed but then we had to go home today was fun and I would like to do the same again soon.
